subject: Didn't receive my package
description_text:
Hey, I got an email that said that my simrig handbrake is delivered but I
never received it. The order number is #SSN4893

conversations.body_text: Hi Eirik Esits,    We apologize for the delay in shipping your order. We have now arranged for UPS expedited shipping for you.    https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510418619338/trackdetails
